meanings: (신체활동) [명사] exercise, workout, (스포츠) sports, (Am) athletics, [동사] exercise, take[do] exercise, work out
(조직적 집단 활동) [명사] movement, campaign (for/against), (회사·정부 차원의) drive (for)
